case.title: Friends maybe more... - 24
case.text:
Hey,
I'm a twenty four year old student, size 16/18. looking for someone to entertain me. I'm looking for friendship first but who knows it could be something more. A good sense of humour is essential!
If you want to know more send me a message.
Love
S
(p.s one night stands are NOT my cup of tea)
